(4). 使用方法
进入源码目录, 执行如下命令:
ctags -R --c-kinds=+p --fields=+S .

(5). 使用例子
" Usage:
"           hotkey:
"               "<tab>" (default value of g:completekey)
"               Do all the jobs with this key, see
"           example:
"               press <tab> after function name and (
"                 foo ( <tab>
"               becomes:
"                 foo ( /<first param>`,/<second param>` )
"               press <tab> after code template
"                 if <tab>
"               becomes:
"                 if( /<...>` )
"                 {
"                     /<...>`
"                 }
